input.sentences: the family all went on a hike together .
this grave had the name of someone we knew .
we watched the sun set through the trees .
we ended the day by looking at the ocean .
output.sentences: I went on a hike with my family.
After that we went and visited the cemetery.
We took time to see some graves.
We then watched the sun set behind those trees.
We ended our day at the ocean.
